snippet: Peyton Manning said he was practicing in gloves for Saturday’s playoff game against the Ravens as a concession to the changes in his body since the neck injury that sidelined him last season.
abstract: Denver Broncos quarterback Payton Manning has been practicing in gloves for playoff game against Baltimore Ravens as concession to changes in his body since neck injury that sidelined him last season.
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning said he was practicing in gloves for Saturday’s playoff game against the Ravens as a concession to the changes in his body since the neck injury that sidelined him last season.

headline.seo: Broncos’ Manning Keeps the Gloves On
headline.main: Facing Ravens and Cold, Manning Keeps Gloves On
headline.print_headline: Facing Ravens and Cold, Manning Keeps Gloves On
